thread.title: Best value in NYC
thread.title_full: Best value in NYC - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: J1823WSjohnf
title: Best value in NYC
text: We booked a junior king suite with Central Park view. Less than $300/night including all tax and fees. Includes WiFi and reception with wine and heavy snacks 5-7pm. The snacks can serve as dinner if you eat a heavy lunch. Location is great, next door to Plaza hotel. Subway station 50 yards away that goes from central park south to Broadway, 42 street, SOHO, World Trade Center, ground zero. Best secret bargain in the city. We spent 5 days and the staff was great. No complaints. We stayed in a recently remodeled room.
